org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.observation.filter

Class DeleteSubtreeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.observation.filter.DeleteSubtreeFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFilter

    public class DeleteSubtreeFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventFilter
    This EventFilter implementation excludes events for child nodes of removed nodes.
